original_text: Many times did he deliver them; but they provoked him with their counsel, and were brought low for their iniquity.
korean_text: 여호와께서 여러 번 그들을 건지시나 그들은 교묘하게 거역하며 자기 죄악으로 말미암아 낮아짐을 당하였도다

sentences.original_text: Many times did he deliver them
but they provoked him with their counsel
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그들의 계획으로 그를 격노하게 했고

sentences.original_text: and were brought low for their iniquity
